original_text: And he sat down opposite the treasury and watched the people putting money into the offering box. Many rich people put in large sums.
korean_text: 예수께서 헌금함을 대하여 앉으사 무리가 어떻게 헌금함에 돈 넣는가를 보실새 여러 부자는 많이 넣는데

sentences.original_text: And he sat down opposite the treasury
putting money into the offering box
Many rich people put in large sums
